Ligurian: A mappa di terramòtti do Çentro Geològico di Stati Unii o no l’aiva segnallou di terramòtti in Islanda pe-a settemaña primma. 
English:: A map of the Earth's crust by the United States Geological Survey shows the island of Ireland and the Irish Sea as part of the European crust.
